data.text: @CBCHealth No, coercion and threats were to blame for  any initial uptake of a single dose you tyrants

@CBCHealth No. Stop this. 
Adverse reactions from the second jab are why we aren’t boosting. Listen to us. 
Read about us. @theysayitsrare 
Stop behaving as if you don’t know what’s going on. 
Talk to neurologists, cardiologists, vascular specialists.
You aren’t permitted to report about us
